name: DabloonClicker
description:
Join the Dablooniverse and collect your fair share of dabloons! 💰

If this mini-project earns some love (and if I have time) I plan to add some audio, some accessories like soup, cloak, hat, guard dogs etc. as well as replace all of the copyright-free images with artwork and maybe even a customizable cat!!!

Given I created this build in roughly 12 hours on thanksgiving I'd say I managed quite a bit for now lol.

Click and Drag with the mouse if you're on PC. The intention is for it to be like a mobile game so use the mouse cursor like you would your finger.

Credits:

  • Inspired by CookieClicker
  • Dabloon TikTok Cat
  • Images from Copyright Free Websites
